name: R1
layman_phrase: Mild to moderate non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (NSC R1)

name: R2
medical_phrase:
Venous beading
Venous loop or reduplication
Intraretinal microvascular abnormality (IRMA)
Multiple deep, round or blot haemorrhages - Cotton Wool Spots (CWS)

name: R3
medical_phrase:
New vessels on disk (NVD)
New vessels elsewhere (NVE)
Pre-retinal or vitreous haemorrhage
Pre-retinal fibrosis ± tractional retinal detachment

name: RP1
layman_phrase: Previous diabetic retinopathy treated with scatter laser (NSC P)

name: RP2
layman_phrase: Previous diabetic retinopathy treated with scatter laser (NSC P)

name: M1
medical_phrase:
Exudate within 1 disc diameter (DD) of the centre of the fovea
Circinate or group of exudates within the macula
Retinal thickening within 1DD of the centre of the fovea (if stereo available)
Any microaneurysm of haemorrhage within 1DD of the centre of the fovea only if associated with a best visual acuity of ≤ 6/12 (if no stereo)

name: MP1
layman_phrase: Previous diabetic maculopathy treated with laser (NSC P)

name: MP2
layman_phrase: Previous diabetic maculopathy treated with laser (NSC P)
